content.detailedDescription: Went out for a cig looked up and was looking at this star as it was so bright ..The brightest star i have ever seen.Was just staring at it and it got brighter and brighter until it started moving up and yes i mean up i was shocked the brightness never faded it then changed direction really quick then just disappeared ...Wow ..It almost felt like that it knew i saw it then it just went .
content.summary: Star like object stupidly bright not a plane or comet

content.detailedDescription:
Sighting occurred during the night after the passing of a severe thunderstorm in the area.

it was about two in the morning, and i couldn't sleep.  my bedroom window was open and its situated on the second floor, which looks out to the south.

lying in my bed i looked out of the window and saw a horizontal line of multi-colored lights, perhaps 7 or 8.  we live within the flight pattern to salt lake international, and the jets normally pass overhead at about 10,000 feet. whatever i saw was low, slow and noiseless, which i found odd.

i got up, opened the window and watched the object slowly move south, it was then joined by another similar object following it. like i mentioned, both looked like a vertical line of lights.

i became intrigued when the first object rotated to the east and the vertical line of lights became the shape of a rounded boomerang. the second line of lights soon did the same.

i excitedly woke up my wife, she saw them as well, but remains unimpressed about the sighting.

i have a pilot's license and i'm an aviation buff, so if these were aircraft, they were something i've never seen.

we live close to a helicopter base, so it wasn't a helo...And the new nsa center.  perhaps they were part of some special project but they definitely were not helos, or conventional aircraft.

this is the second ufo sighting i've had in the area.  the other was a couple of years before. i witnessed a massive, dark, triangle shaped object that flew over the area.  the outline of which was barely discernable and it seemed to be mirroring the stars above it as you looked at the bottom of it.  soundless as well.
content.summary: Two boomerang type objects - slow and soundless

content.detailedDescription: I was playing basketball with my two sons. i told my youngest to shoot the ball but he was fixed on the sky. i turned up to see what he was looking at and i saw a very shinny object in the sky. i immediately took out my camera phone and started taking pics. i took about 5 before i started looking at the pics. when i zoomed in on the pics it looked very different from what i could see with my naked eye. from my naked eye it looked like one sphere. when zoomed in on there were spheres inside the the main sphere they would change placement on the object as well. in some pics the object seems to be breaking apart into smaller pieces but still remained the same size to the naked eye. this event lasted for around two hours then it got very cloudy out and couldn't make it out any longer. there were around 6 people who saw this including my kids
content.summary: Very shinny circle shaped changed color when i zoom in on the pics there's lights that are seen and some type of trail

content.detailedDescription:
Les escribo para reportar dos avistamientos producidos en el remanso de la molina, en los ãºltimos dos meses.
el 3 de diciembre, alrededor de las 8pm, un amigo y yo vimos una fuerte luz naranja rojizo desde el parque las cedrelas, en direcciã³n al cerro centinela. estuvo allã­ durante un minuto, completamente quieta y sin emitir ruido. cuando me recuperã© del asombro, saque mi telã©fono para grabar, pero se desvaneciã³.
en mi telã©fono tengo skymap, una aplicaciã³n para determinar la posiciã³n de las estrellas, y pude observar que, desde mi perspectiva, el objeto estuvo unos 5â° por encima la ubicaciã³n de marte.
solemos ir a ese parque todos los dã­as a pasear a nuestros perros, y vemos aviones desplazã¡ndose de izquierda a derecha, como de surco a ate, pero esta la luz era mucho mã¡s grande.
cabe resaltar que la noche del 5 de octubre de este aã±o, vi una luz parecida desde el parque de la calle los aromos y casi en la misma direcciã³n. en esa ocasiã³n, como fue la noche de las elecciones, tratã© de racionalizarlo pensando que podrã­a haber sido una bengala lanzada desde surco, o algãºn otro tipo de fuego artificial, pero me quedã³ la duda. ahora, estoy convencido de que no fue eso.
esa noche, la luz se movã­a hacia nosotros muy despacio y sin ruido, y ya estaba listo para grabar con mi celular, pero mi perro se fue corriendo hacia la pista. en esa oportunidad estaba sã³lo y no vi como desapareciã³.
en ninguno de los casos puede haber sido una luz en el cerro. en ambas ocasiones habã­a cierta nubosidad que producã­a un halo que hacã­a que la luz se viera un poco mã¡s grande, pero no eran aviones.
me he animado a escribirles porque he sabido que han habido otros avistamientos en la molina, y esta vez, a pesar de no haber podido capturar evidencia, no estaba solo.
saludos.
content.summary: Esfera luminosa aranajada moviã©ndose en lã­nea recta sobre la molina (lima)

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way from picking my girlfriend up from work when we get to a stop sign i notice a very bright light hovering above the old wood shop in our town. the light was so bright and big that it could not go unnoticed. so i get my camera out on my phone and started to record the orb. soon as i start recording it starts moving at swift soft speeds but somehow even though it looks like its traveling slow its actually hard for me to keep up with it as im driving at speeds up to 80 miles an hour it progressively speeds up beyond my recording abilities and disappears behind the trees where i lost the craft as it goes through the clouds and disappears. chills go down my body as i think to my self was that an actual ufo that i just saw. stunned by the event i have decided to turn this video in for experts to examine.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Strange huge light found over idabel ok moving at irregular speeds

content.detailedDescription: Check surveillance camera in morning found orb checking out camera at 2:30 in morning while family sleeping. there is a car on road here or there but it is right up near camera. each video has a close orb checking cam out. you tell me what it is..
content.summary: Caught on video

content.detailedDescription: I and my brother were sitting outside of the house facing north on the edge of the yard. we had our backs leaned against the wall of a wooden shed i was sitting almost to the edge of the wall, we were talking when my brother(18yrs old) pointed on the east south east side i leaned forward a bit and looked up while still sitting and saw a bright green glow light it seemed to be directly over the street which is not far from where we were seated about a 150 ft it was about 10 ft higher than the street post lamp it moved slowly as patiently waiting for something. the entire event lasted about 15-20 minutes it traveled in the sky from the east toward the north in a curved manner then hovered for 4-5 minutes then  moved toward the west. all along the way it did not travel a stable consistent path it moved in a very slow speed quickly zig zagging pattern as if vibrating just a little, the object looked like the size of a basketball with a light on it. the light was bright green extremely bright when it stayed still i was watching and i could barely make out the shape of the solid object. it was circular  and flat on top but the bottom was more like a cone shape not a sphere.It then moved from north toward the west in the night sky, the light source appeared to me to be the size of a golf ball but glowing very very bright what i noticed is that despite its brightness it did not give off surrounding light like a bulb or flashlight. as it passed over the tree top and the leaves of the tree looked dark like if no light shone although it was about 5 ft above the highest branch. since i first saw it i heard no noise coming from it, the ufo was very silent it traveled on the night sky slowly until it had gotten so far i could not see it, the night sky seemed like a normal dark sky, no wind also the neighborhood was asleep no cars no people outside around that we could see, this event took place between 11:30pm - 1:00 am on the month of march 2014. this ufo came from south of the street and curved around us going north stayed still across my wire fence above my neighbors abandoned empty yard then moved toward the west across over the next side of the street on the edge of the small town where i live it went west over the bushes and trees of huge undeveloped land. can someone tell me what are they doing here in central america such a small country belize. here we have no power plants, no war, no mineral mines, no mass production metal factories only farming what makes me scarred is that this ufo came so close to us and slowly it moved until i could no longer see it, also hovered infront on my neighbors land about the height of a 2 floor building what does it want or why come to an uninteresting  place like belize in orange walk disctrict. what is it looking for in the people here? someone answer me..
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A solid object the size of a basketball with a very bright glowing light on it the size of a golf ball

content.detailedDescription:
Went to take dog outside to use facilities.  was looking in sky for jets & airliners- live near mcguire afb.  so usually some traffic either airline ( on n/s route) & /or afb c130's & sometime s fighters 
looking east in sky abt120*), saw a circulsr object with lights circling the perimeter. it was not moving.  thought it was weird, so looked elsewhere in area & @ dog.  object did not move.  just hung there. no sound @ all.  it appeared to be solid as the interior area appeared slightly lighter than surrounding sky.  i got kind of scared & having a senior dog,brought him inside it did not move for the 7 minutes i was outside. i tried to take a picture & -a video but iphone wouldn't /couldn't take the photo/video.
probably just a satellite or balloon, but needed to let someone know in case it was not
i wish i hd looked again. but i was nervous being the only one awake & downstairs .  sorry i was too afraid to go back outside because i had put the outdoor lights on so if there was anything/one intelligent inside they would have seen the lights- i was the only one with lights on
i went out side at approximately 2:33 am and went back inside about 2:40
times are within 1-2 minutes
content.summary: Stayed in 1 spot , no noise, mvmnt. never seen anything like it ., scared me

content.detailedDescription: I came in around 5:50am to my truck yard off of higuera/high street. i was working and happened to look up in the sky. i noticed a brightly colored craft with lights on the surface, the lights were pink/red, blue, and green. when i focused i than saw the shape of some sort of craft. it was hovering so still it looked like the moon. there was no movement which made me think i was seeing things. i stood there until i saw movement which it smoothly and quickly descended a few feet but still in pain site. i called my coworkers so that i could have witnesses, we all saw it and caught in on video. it than continued to descend smoothly and quickly behind the freeway. i was in shock disbelief and received proof of what i have doubted for so long. the object descended beyond the freeway.
content.summary: Working looked up and saw a brightly covered stationary craft observed for 6 minutes than it descended dropped down stopped than minute later kept dropping smoothly and disappeared behind freeway.

content.detailedDescription: While driving by the auke bay ferry terminal i noticed 5 orange lights to the north at 1500-3000 ft.  i drove 1/2 mile more past the terminal, pulled over, rolled down the window, stuck my head out and watched one directly above me.  there was a truck pulled over too. watched it for at least 1 minute after which it slowly faded out.  i think it was about 2000 feet above me.  it was a monday evening about 9pm.  either 3/2 or 3/9.  only noticed one when i pulled over, rest behind the trees. no sound.
content.summary: Saw 5 orange lights n of ferry terminal while driving, pulled over and watched one slowly disapear directly above me.

content.detailedDescription:
My boys as young kids, my husband, and myself.

days and dates unknown.


i would always feel a electric in the air before i would wee them.
content.summary: Raining day

content.detailedDescription: I was on my deck a couple years ago filming a plane i didn't see what crossed the plane's path until i watch the video. not sure what it is? maybe you might have an idea?
content.summary: I was on my deck a couple years ago filming a plane

content.detailedDescription:
0320z 02apr2015.  withacooche state forrest along sr 471. incident occurred at sr 471 and narrow dirt logging road east of roadway approximately 5.9 miles south of florida intersection of state route 50 and sr 471 (tarrytown, fl) meteorological and terrain: moon illumination good casting visible shadows on standing objects, low ground mist observed in area, but not at incident site. entity in protective suit to include helmet observed operating equipment/scanner. 

narrative: observer is a commercial driver operating an 18-wheeler north on sr 471 at a rate of approximately 60 mph. dim light flashes on east side of road way caught driver's attention and observed an individual in at an entrance of logging trail, approximately 3 meters from edge of roadway in the center of the trail. individual was wearing a containment suit. suit was off white in color. individual was between 1.5 and 1.8 meters tall. individual was operating a device which was held in front at mid section level. device emitted rapid bursts of light in a clockwise circular direction downward and coned out in an 30 degree angle. an unknown substance or organic material in the air reacted to the light pulses, with brilliant small star bursts of white light. light bursts illuminated the individuals presence and illuminated his suit details. suit details: individual's footwear was a different material and color of the suit, darker brown in color. individual had a harness system that extended over the shoulders and ended at midsection. harness system supported a pentagon shaped box on the individuals chest. white in color, with gold or darker brown geometric symbols on the front. individual was wearing a large oval shaped helmet with reflected light from the device and headlight of the vehicle. total time of encounter:8 seconds. closest distance to entity: 5 meters. driver continued making observations until terrytown. gps, cb and radio were off at time of incident and vehicle instrumentation and operation functioned normally. no indication of emr. end of report.
content.summary: Encounter with unknown entity

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside my house to look at the stars and i noticed above the nw horizon two reddish orange objects glowing and pulsing. one was way behind the other traveling in a se direction.My first thought was helicopters but there was no noise and no strobe lights.  as i got my field glasses out of my truck the objects stopped and hovered in place for about five minutes. the light coming from them was fuzzy around the edges and bright. no sounds were heard. then they started moving backward toward the nw and were almost out of sight when the one closest to me suddenly flashed the lights real bright and both of them just disappeared. 

several minutes went by and then an airforce jet came streaking across the same area the two objects were in, traveling west to east at a high rate of speed.
content.summary: Two glowing objects red and orange pulsating bright lights.

content.detailedDescription: We were on vacation driving towards silvercity new mexico. we decided to stop to look at stars like we can't see at home. there are no cars coming from either direction and it is beautiful!!!!!! we are looking at the amazing amount of starts when!!! i'm looking at stars when these two stars start moving together to the right (not sure of n s e w)...They are two lights moving as if they are together....But it's such a great distance apart and moving together and far off. i point them out to my husband and we watched them for about 3 minutes. he said satellite, i say no way,there were two lights that stayed the same distance apart traveling in the same direction until we could no longer see them.
content.summary: Was looking at the stars weekend l when we saw these two lights start moving from the stars to the right until we could no longer see them. the lights wert far apart but moved together.My husband said satellite........But they weren't!

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking pictures of los angeles from the highest point of signal hill.
i saw this green blue dot behind an airliner coming from lax.
i took three pictures and the object moved toward lax.
i didn't look anything like a plane. more like a fuzzy blue green hazy dot.
the blue dot is visible to the left and above the la sky line in the pictures.
content.summary: Took picture of la when i saw a blue dot.

content.detailedDescription: I saw a round ufo flying low over my head at night over the sky in girona in the north east of spain on 30.03.2015 at around 02:00 am. there was no noise and the object was emitting a very dim and diffuse amber glow similar in colour of the street lamps below but not bright. it was a rather large object and it was flying at constant speed and altitude roughly in a north - south direction. it was clearly visible well below the clouds and not far from the ground. it flew over my head  and i was able to follow its trajectory all the way until it disappeared in the horizon. i was having a cigarette outside late at night with my friend when this happened.
content.summary: Large dim amber object

content.detailedDescription: I was taking some pictures of the cathedral of sevilla by night with my iphone6plus. looking at the pics next morning i have descovered 3 lights next to the tower which i have not seen the nigth before. i felt very exciteted and hope i have finally spotted an ufo.
content.summary: Ufo sighting near the cathedral of sevilla (spain)

content.detailedDescription: A friend was visiting san francisco, california on wednesday april 8th and 9th, 2015. she took numerous photos during the trip. once i saw the photos i observed an oval shaped object in the sky. the object was in three different photos. this was not seen by the naked eye while taking the p{nd} hotos, she had no idea about the objects until they were seen in the photos afterwards.
content.summary: Seems like a disc shaped craft

content.detailedDescription:
On the date above me and family members saw a slow moving andat times 
stationary, a craft over a the dunes on the west coast of oregon.
the craft at the time was all red, then it tuned blue for about 10 sec.
then green about same duration. then the craft amitted a bright red that was twice asbright as the blue and green were so i looked through my scope and what i saw was a craft inside the red ball of light. after dimming back to a
normal red thecraft started to move at a slow pace north. after moving north
for about a mile or so it stopped decended about 1000ft in about a sec.
stpped at tree top level and slowly decended the rest of the way to the ground. that was the last time it was seen.
we have icbm sits here in coos county and up and down the coast.
about three week before the sighting meand my wife andtwo others saw a russin back fire bommer flying over the same area that the ufo was spotted.Is this conected.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Orbe colors green then blue then all red inside red ora craft inside, color red more bright than blue or red

content.detailedDescription:

look for yourself
content.summary: Exiting store and see it

content.detailedDescription: My fiance and i were about to go to town which was about 8 miles from homeas we always do we were taking pictures of stratus clouds one really in particular but looks strange almost like a fish skeleton after two or three pictures with my camera phone and handed it to my fiance as she took a couple of pictures as well. since we were going the direction of the clouds anyway about 6 miles up the road decided to take a couple of more we finished our business in town and headed home it was then as we looked over the pictures that we noticed these objects in other words we didn't see them with our naked eye  taking the pictures i believe there were ,,even too fast for the naked eye thank you for auauthenticating we don't know i just know that we did take the pictures and noticed the moment them later thank you very much
content.summary: My fiance and i were taking pictures of a stratus cloud when we went over them then noticed the ufos

content.detailedDescription: I was working out side into the evening.  i noticed the stars for about an hour when one  star took off.   the object could have been a tac sat, as it had to be 75 to 100 thousand feet above the earth. object move from the se to the nw in about 60 to 90 seconds.  i looked at my watch for the time and i knew the direction as i have used a compass often.  i knew what i saw and was sober.  i have seen tac sats often moveing in the early mornings and evening hours as at that time refection from the sun gives them a star like look.
content.summary: I observered beautiful a stary night for a an hour or more when one star moved from it's position in the se to a nw flight path across the horizion 60 to 90 seconds flight time until out of sight to the nw

content.detailedDescription: I was again sleep on the bed facing the sky space & using my binocular to see star & i saw this object wings like jet plane fly straight ahead to east very slow ahead & is very very far away like a tiny dot while using my binocular & its light flash bit by bit like an airplane.  my goodness my arms muscle can't hold that heavy. binocular so long to watch that object crossing over to east.
content.summary: I was again sleep on the bed facing the sky space & using my binocular to see star & i saw this object wings like jet plane fly straight ahead to east very slow ahead & is very very far away like a tiny dot while using my binocular & it flash bit by bit

content.detailedDescription: About 11:00 pm, while sitting in my van, i saw an unusual object hovering at a very low altitude, not much higher than treetop level. since this happened in cleveland, ohio, i knew no plane or blimp would be flying over a city at that low an altitude. the object started moving in my direction, and then all the lights turned off on the object. no pilot would turn off his lights over a large city. as the object passed about a thousand feet from me, i could see the outline of the shape, because streetlights provide quite a bit of light. it was similar to a blimp shape, but had no tail or undercarriage. also, it was totally silent. at that distance i should have been able to hear an engine. then the object turned on a straight row of 9 or 10 lights, on the bottom of the object. blimps do not carry long rows of lights on their small undercarriage. the object looked much over a hundred feet long. it passed out of my sight because the trees blocked my view as it kept moving at a very low altitude. i worked with planes in the navy, so i am familiar with nighttime operations of flying objects. this object was something i can't explain.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saw an object i could not explain

content.detailedDescription: Myself, my bf and our friend were driving in bend, or. at 2 am.  and while doing so, we all witnessed a diagonal line of lights on the west horizon towards the cascade mountain range. the lights would all get brighter and then darker again. some would break out of formation or dim out or go below the horizon and come back again. those went away so we went back down awbrey butte and then saw another set of lights on the se horizon. the lights would dim from white to red and then some of the lights in the line would become red except for one. that one light that was still white would get extremely bright!! all three of us have never seen anything like this before. we stopped our plans and persued this strange lights
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Diagonal line of lights. turning white & red. changing angles

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking the washing off the line and looked up as i usually do, gazing at the stars. and there is a small - tiny - orange-red light moving across the sky. it was the same size if not a bit smaller then the stars it was passing by. i recon it was way to far up for any plane to fly at. i'd seen it before - maybe not that exact one, but same characteristics - doing the exact same thing a few years back, but heading in a different direction. the one i saw tonight though, was a solid orange-red colour - it wasn't flashing or pulsing - it was just moving across the sky. i was by the side of the house so i lost sight of it when it went behind the roof, i ran to the other side to try and see it, but because we have a lot of street lamps around that side, i couldn't see it. the other side was dark with the lights blocked by the neighbours.

a few seconds later, i turn and there is this other light. it was at plane-flying height, but i could've sworn it wasn't a plane. it was a bright orange and flashing, but only that one colour. not other lights blinked or anything. it was like the other one, but closer and easier to see. it won't mean anything, but at a certain point, a shooting star passed along side the flashing light.
content.summary: Really, really far away. easily mistaken for a tiny star, but it was moving quickly across the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
1) taking pictures with a new camera.
2) a bright light moving very fast.
3)i had no idea.
4) very bright moving very fast , it seemed to go in a straight line. it seemed to pause for a slit second before a faster pace before speeding out of sight.
5) i was puzzled upon seeing this object then i thought to try and capture it on film. so i got five shots in before it disappeared out of sight. when i came in the house to view what i got, i zoomed the pictures in and was really puzzled by what i saw.
6) it just moved really fast till it was out of sight.
content.summary: Bright shining light moving very fast.

content.detailedDescription:
This is probably nothing, but i saw something odd. just to let you know, i am an attorney and an engineer and i feel strange saying anything about this. 

  i was taking my pugs out at 9:30 pm on april 09, 2015, pst, and it was a clear night and i always look at stars and try to identify them and i use that google app that helps you identify stars and planets. there was an exceedingly bright star, much brighter than venus and it was going a bit faster than i see satellites go on a normal basis. i also see planes from time to time when i look up and they don't look like stars. planes don't look like bright stars. it was going about 1/2 a degree a second. i watched it from 9:30 pm until 9:32 pm. i yelled at my wife to check it out but she doesn't care about this stuff. it completely disappeared at 9:33 pm, just went out.

    at first. i thought the object was the space station and i felt super lucky to see it. then, i remembered that i watched it go by last year and it was really faint to see. this object was super bright, like a super bright venus, going way faster than a normal satellite and super bright.  the object did not dim nor differ in any of the two minutes i watched it, it was bright the entire time, it was overly bright. at the third minute it just went dark. no satellite goes dark when still in view. after the light of the object went out, i spotted a dim satellite at 65 degrees to my left and it was traveling at least 5 times slower and much more dim. 

    my location of viewing is: [coordinates moved to fi section/cms/tg]. standing on my porch facing north and putting my arm up in the air, the total viewing time was 80 degrees to my left, and disappeared at about 110 degrees on my right and that was about 2 minutes. it was definitely not a meteor because there was no tail. it simply looked like venus (a ball of light, brighter than venus moving in the sky) if it was about 3 times it's size in the sky. 

    i am a lawyer and an engineer, and for an object to move that fast in a geosynchronous orbit makes no sense to me, especially when the object is so bright, then suddenly goes black.  i know i sound like a crazy person, but that is what i saw. it was literally going super fast in an orbital pattern that is not mathematically possible. what does that? oh, one more thing, it did not change the appearance in any way, it was just a super bright venus for two minutes and the next it just turned off and wasn't there. 
 
i hope it was an asteroid or some old russian satellite.
content.summary: Object brighter than venus going sw to ne that dissapeared

content.detailedDescription: I think i witnessed a nova (nova don't blip, i think) or some kind of cosmetic event nearby star pollux instead of ufo. coincidently, there was a very fast meteor went westward at the near same moment seeing a jet liner cruising by and noticed a satellite sl-14 r/b watching it dimming and glowing toward northwest. i was about to go to go inside but saw the blip. the meteor did have the same color and magnitude as the blip. the blip was close as polaris in color but maybe one more magnitude dimmer. mag 3-4ish. but, when that meteor entered our atmosphere it was nearly at the same location where the blip occurred. and, that blip occurred about an minute or two afterward that meteor event. there was no floodlight present that can make a dust to sparkle. i know what i saw. i need a way to reach astronomer by large to make sure this was not a false call.
content.summary: See details below, instead.
